title: Re: help wanted
content:
Using modkeen is not that hard, just make sure that you have version 1.4 of Keen 4-5 and version 1.4 (which isn't the most recent one) of Keen 6 so that you can use it. You must uncompress your exe file first using UNLZEXE from [url=http://dosclassics.com/download/198]here[/url].

Then put modkeen into your Keen 4 directory, make a shortcut and go edit the target and add "-export -episode=4" save, and run the shortcut.

Then repeat the step for Keen 5-6, changing the -episode= command to -episode=5 and -episode=6.
